KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory compareGT 005
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareGT function to compare two Directories and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Directory are compared to determine whether one Directory is greater than the other.

Syntax.Note: The first Directory is greater than the second Directory.
